page.title: 12EATING OUT-DUNTON GREEN AREA
page.content: In our block we have 2 hotels, 8 pubs & 3 take-aways. Donnington Manor, a mock Tudor building was built just after the Second World War & is now joined onto the Emma Hotel. The creator of Donnington Manor was Bill Newman, a local man & an expert in building mock Tudor, using genuine materials from all over the country. You can get a meal at most of the public houses. At the Tatts Club you can get bed & breakfast. At some places you can eat outside. The 3 take-aways are the Taj Tandoori,which is an Indian restaurant as well as a take-away, the Sun-On, a Chinese take- away, and Hei's chip-shop which is a fish & chip shop as well as a Chinese take-away.
